author: SRGOM
body:
https://devblogs.microsoft.com/powershell/powershell-7-preview-3/

> in order to solicit more feedback for the PowerShell Committee to determine if a feature should continue as experimental, move from experimental to stable (non-experimental),


Where does one give this feedback? I want to vote 100/10 for PSUseAbbreviationExpansion

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: I guess it is more about waiting negative feedback. If no problems a feature will be accepted as stable.

title: feedback for experimental features
